ModMetaData.name: SimpleCameraSetting
ModMetaData.author: ray1203
ModMetaData.description:
There are a lot of great features in the camera+, but I made this mod because of the performance issue. You can modify the zoom range, zoom speed, smooth zoom settings, etc. If you want some more camera settings comment it!
You can make camera follows your pawn. Default key is backspace and you can change it.
This mod works same as changing camera settings at dev mod.
Do not use it with camera+ mode.
